title: Katy Perry stuns at London Fashion Week after chopping her hair into short platinum bob
text:
Katy Perry stuns at London Fashion Week after chopping her hair into short platinum bob The singer rocks her new look Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Katy Perry ditched her signature black hair and hit the bleach just over a week ago. 
And now, after going heavy on the hair dye, the 32-year-old singer is rocking a roughly chopped bob. 
But heading to London Fashion Week today to watch British designer Christopher Kane's show, Katy made the most of her new look. 
She showed off her bare shoulders in a Bardot-style strapless top. Katy Perry attends the Christopher Kane show at London Fashion Week (Photo: Getty Images) 
She added a black choker to direct attention to her dainty collarbone. 
The metallic dress cinched the pop star in at the waist showing off her figure. 
She added matching silver boots to finish off the futuristic look. 
Katy wore smoky brown eyeshadow and wore a silver nose ring to bring an edge to her outfit. Katy showed off her new haircut (Photo: Getty Images) She wore a metallic dress (Photo: WireImage) 
Earlier this month, Katy came under fire from Britney Spears fans after she referenced the pop star's meltdown. 
The Roar singer was being interview by E! host Ryan Seacrest ahead of the Grammy Awards on Sunday when he asked about her break from the spotlight. 
"There was a pause in the music for a little while," Ryan said. 
"Yeah that's called taking care of your mental health," Katy replied. 
When he asked how that went, she joked: "Fantastic! And I haven't shaved my head yet." (Photo: Getty Images North America) Read More Grammy Awards 2017 best dressed stars: Adele, Carrie Underwood, Paris Jackson and Heidi Klum steal the show 
Ryan then changed the subject, but Katy also made the reference during another interview with CBS. 
And following her comments, one angry fan wrote on Twitter: "OK FINE I turned on the Grammys and Katy Perry was making a snide ‘Britney breakdown head-shaving’ reference & I'm not down with that. 
Another said: “I just lost all my respect for Katy Perry, well the litle respect I did have for her.” 
A #KatyPerryIsOver hashtag also popped up, much like the one her fans created for Taylor Swift last year. Going green in 2014 (Photo: Getty) 
Meanwhile, Katy's choice of outfit for the occasion left a lot to be desired. 
The star looked sensational from the waist up, in a rose gold sequined number teamed with newly-blonde bed-head locks and fierce make-up. 
But the outfit was let down by the bottom half of her dress, which was a mass of ombre feathers which completely clashed with the top.
